original_text:
Fruity Crown
Questa slot riprende il classico tema della frutta, ma ha dalla sua dei simboli speciali che innalzano di molto la possibilità di portarsi a casa ottime vincite. Per raccontarvi Fruity Crown partiamo dal comparto grafico, molto curato come ci si aspetta ogni qualvolta ci si trova davanti a un prodotto della Playson. I simboli sono ben definiti e i colori sgargianti, i rulli si muovono su uno sfondo nero e ai lati della cornice sono visualizzate le linee di pagamento. Nella parte sottostante alla griglia potrete trovare il credito totale, l’ammontare della scommessa e i tasti per aumentare o diminuire il valore su ogni linea di gioco, il pulsante per impostare la scommessa massima in un colpo solo, il tasto per la rotazione manuale e quello per avviare i giri automatici. Ad accompagnare il gioco non c’è nessun effetto sonoro, ma solo il rumore della rotazione dei rulli.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
La griglia di gioco di Fruity Crown ha 5 rulli e 4 righe, le linee di pagamento sono ben 100 e fisse, cioè non è possibile aumentare o diminuire il numero. La puntata minima è di 0,20 €, la massima 100 €. Le combinazioni paganti si sviluppano da sinistra a destra, in caso di più combinazioni vincente sulla stessa linea verrà pagata solo la più alta. Attraverso il tasto Autoplay si possono far partire i giri automatici, anche se non si può impostarne un numero definito: quando si vuole tornare alla modalità manuale basterà cliccare il tasto STOP. L’RTP è del 95,2%, non un granché a dire la verità,  e la volatilità media. Non è previsto nessun sistema di Free Spins. La vincita massima è di 1.056 volte la scommessa.
Simboli e funzionalità di Fruity Crown
I simboli regolari sono tutti a tema frutta, oltre al numero 7, ci sono inoltre un simbolo Wild a espansione e 2 Scatter. I simboli che pagano meno sono il limone, l’arancia, la prugna e le ciliegie, se escono per tre volte pagano 10 volte la puntata, con 5 si arriva a 100, quindi comunque si parla di cifre consistenti. La pera paga sino 400 volte e con l’anguria e l’uva si arriva a 1.000! Il numero 7 paga anche con soli 2 simboli, con 5 si arriva a 5.000 volte la puntata. Tra i simboli speciali troviamo la corona che ha funzione di Jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto gli Scatter. Può apparire solo sui rulli 2, 3, e 4 e in una combinazione vincente si espande, aumentando in modo esponenziale le possibilità di vincita. Fruity Crown prevede due simboli Scatter: Diamante e Oro. Il primo è rappresentato da una stella azzurra, può comparire solo sui rulli 1, 3 o 5, e ne bastano 3 per vincere 2.000 volte il valore della scommessa. Lo stella dorata può apparire su qualsiasi rullo e paga in base al numero di simboli: con 3 avremo un ritorno pari a 300 volte la puntata, con 4 stelle 2.000 volte e infine con 5 simboli raggiungeremo una vincita di 10.000 volte rispetto alla nostra scommessa!

raw_translation.response:
"Fruity Crown" is a classic fruit-themed slot game that offers special symbols with great potential for big wins. The graphics are well-crafted with vibrant colors, and the reels spin against a black background with visible paylines. The interface displays the total credit, betting amount, and buttons to adjust the value of each payline, set maximum bets, manual or autoplay options. The absence of background music only amplifies the sound of the spinning reels. 

The game has 5 reels and 100 fixed paylines, with a minimum bet limit of €0.20 and a maximum limit of €100. Winning combinations are formed from left to right, with the highest combination paying out. Autoplay is available with no specific number of spins, and the RTP is 95.2% with medium volatility. Free spins are not included, and the maximum win is 1,056 times the bet.

The regular symbols include fruits and the number seven, while there are also an expanding wild symbol and two scatters. The lower paying symbols are the lemon, orange, plum, and cherries, paying out 10 times the bet for three symbols and 100 for five symbols. The pear pays out up to 400 times the bet, while the watermelon and grapes offer a payout of up to 1,000 times the bet. The number seven pays out for only two symbols and up to 5,000 times for five symbols. The crown symbol acts as a wild and replaces all symbols except the scatters, appearing only on reels 2, 3, and 4. The diamond scatter can only appear on reels 1, 3, and 5, offering a payout of 2,000 times the bet for three symbols. The golden star scatter can appear on any reel and offers payouts of 300 times for three symbols, 2,000 times for four symbols, and 10,000 times for five symbols.

"Fruity Crown" is a game that combines classic fruit symbols with fantastic bonuses that can lead to exciting wins. With its smooth gameplay and great visuals, it's a game that will captivate experienced gamblers and keep them coming back for more.

The autoplay button allows you to start automatic spins, though you can't set a specific number. To return to manual mode, simply click the STOP button. Overall, Fruity Crown is a great slot game that has both classic and innovative elements to it. With its stunning graphics, exciting special symbols, and substantial payouts, it's definitely worth checking out. So, take a spin and see if you can be crowned as the winner of this fruity kingdom!

Overall, Fruity Crown is a great slot game that has both classic and innovative elements to it. With its stunning graphics, exciting special symbols, and substantial payouts, it's definitely worth checking out. So, take a spin and see if you can be crowned as the winner of this fruity kingdom!

Review:
 
Gameplay mechanics

Fruity Crown has a game grid of 5 reels and 4 rows with 100 fixed pay lines, so the number of lines can't be increased or decreased. Winning combinations pay from left to right, and the game has an autoplay feature. The minimum bet is €0.20, while the maximum is €100. The game has an RTP of 95.2%, which is average, and the volatility is average too.

Bet amounts

The minimum bet in Fruity Crown is €0.20, while the maximum is €100. The game provides a button to set the maximum bet in one go, a button to increase or decrease the value on each pay line, and a button for manual rotation.

Symbols

Fruity Crown features fruit-themed regular symbols with the lemon, orange, plum, and cherries symbols paying out 10 times the bet if they appear three times, 100 times the bet if they appear five times. The pear pays up to 400 times, while the watermelon and grapes pay up to 1000 times your bet. The number 7 pays out with two symbols and five symbols, paying up to 5,000 times your bet. Fruity Crown has an expanding wild symbol, the crown, that can replace all symbols except the scatters. The crown appears on reels 2, 3, and 4. Fruity Crown has two scatter symbols, Diamond and Gold. The diamond is represented by a blue star and 3 of these symbols pay out 2,000 times your bet. The gold star pays out based on the number of symbols, with the highest payout of 10,000 times your bet if you get five symbols.

Special features

The crown symbol in Fruity Crown is an expanding wild symbol that replaces all other symbols except the scatters. The special symbols include two scatters, Diamond and Gold. The expanding crown symbol increases your chances of winning and the scatters provide generous payouts. The game also has an autoplay feature, though there is no specific number of automatic spins that can be set. To return to manual play, you simply need to click the STOP button.

Payouts and RTP

Fruity Crown's RTP is 95.2%, which is average. The volatility is also average. The maximum payout is 1,056 times the bet, which is not as high as other slot games. The regular fruit symbols pay out 10-100 times the bet. The pear symbol pays up to 400 times, and the watermelon and grapes pay up to 1,000 times the bet. The number 7 symbol pays out up to 5,000 times the bet. The scatters pay out generously, with the gold star providing the highest payout of 10,000 times the bet if you get five symbols.

Review: Fruity Crown is a classic slot game that features fruit symbols, but what sets it apart are the special symbols that greatly increase your chances of winning big. Let's start by talking about the graphics, which are very well done, as you would expect from a product by Playson. The symbols are well-defined and brightly colored, and the reels move on a black background while the pay lines are displayed on the sides of the frame. Below the grid, you'll find your total credit, your bet amount, and buttons to increase or decrease the value on each pay line. There's also a button to set the maximum bet in one go, a button for manual rotation, and one for starting auto spins. The game is accompanied by no sound effects, only the sound of the reels spinning.

Key Features of the Slot Machine:
Fruity Crown's game grid has 5 reels and 4 rows, with 100 fixed pay lines – meaning you can't increase or decrease the number. The minimum bet is €0.20, while the maximum bet is €100. Winning combinations pay from left to right, and in case there are several winning combinations on the same line, only the highest will be paid out. The autoplay button allows you to start automatic spins, though you can't set a specific number. To return to manual mode, simply click the STOP button. The RTP is 95.2%, which is not great to be honest, while the volatility is average. There is no free spin system and the maximum payout is 1,056 times the bet.

Symbols and Functions of Fruity Crown:
The regular symbols are all fruit-themed, including the number 7, as well as an expanding wild symbol and two scatters. The symbols that pay the least are the lemon, orange, plum, and cherries. If these appear three times, they pay out 10 times the bet, while five of them pay out 100 times the bet – still a considerable sum. The pear pays up to 400 times, and with watermelon and grapes you can reach up to 1,000 times your bet! The number 7 also pays out with just two symbols, but with five of them, you can earn 5,000 times your bet. Among the special symbols is the crown, which acts as a wild symbol and replaces all symbols except the scatters. It can only appear on reels 2, 3, and 4, and in a winning combination, it expands exponentially, increasing your chances of winning. Fruity Crown features two scatter symbols: Diamond and Gold. The diamond is represented by a blue star, and can only appear on reels 1, 3 or 5. Three of these will win you 2,000 times your bet. The gold star can appear on any reel, and pays out according to the number of symbols: with three, you'll get a return equal to 300 times your bet, with four stars – 2,000 times your bet. Finally, with five symbols, you'll earn 10,000 times your bet! 

Overall, Fruity Crown is a great slot game that has both classic and innovative elements to it. With its stunning graphics, exciting special symbols, and substantial payouts, it's definitely worth checking out. So, take a spin and see if you can be crowned as the winner of this fruity kingdom!
